WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I failed to add all the .dll files(.Net45, .Net35, Silverlight) into a Windows phone 8 project created by VS 2013.
I got the following error message:
"A reference to a higher version or incompatible assembly cannot be added to the project"

The .dll files are not support the VS2013?

Thanks,
Ken
WorkItem.Summary: I failed to load the .dll into a Windows phone 8 project created by VS 2013
